import React, { Component } from 'react' // 引入样式文件 import styles from '../../style/Weather.module.less' // 引入请求接口文件 import { getWeatherDate } from '../../api/weather' class Weather extends Component{ constructor () { super() this.state = { weatherData : {}, fiveDayList : [] } } componentDidMount = () => { getWeatherDate() .then((res) => { this.setState({ weatherData : res.data, fiveDayList : res.data.forecastDayList }) }) .catch((err) => { console.log('调用接口错误', err) }) } render(){ let { weatherData, fiveDayList } = this.state console.log(this) return(
